    Home

    Phaser¶

    Phaser is a fun, free and fast 2D game framework for making HTML5 games for desktop and mobile web browsers, supporting Canvas and WebGL rendering.

    List of my plugins¶

    1. BBCodeText: Drawing text with BBCode protocol.
    2. Canvas: Drawing on canvas.
    3. Clock: A clock to count elapsed time.
    4. ContainerLite: Control the position and angle of children game objects.
    5. CSV-scenario: Run script in csv format.
    6. CSV-to-hash-table: Hash table indexed by (col-key, row-key) from csv string.
    7. Drag: Drag game object.
    8. Fade-out-destroy: Fade out game object then destroy it.
    9. Fade-volume: Fade-in/fade-out volume of sound.
    10. FSM: Finite state machine.
    11. Gashapon: Pick random item from box.
    12. Grid table: Viewer of grid table, to manipulate game object of each visible cell.
    13. LZ-string: Compress string using LZ-based compression algorithm.
    14. Page: Display text page by page on text object.
    15. Run-commands: Run commands in array.
    16. Sequence: Run sequence commands in array.
    17. Slider: Drag thumb on a slider bar.
    18. TagText: Displays text with multi-color, font face, or font size with tags.
    19. TCRP.Player: Run commands on time.
    20. TCRP.Recorder: Store commands with time.
    21. Typing: Typing text on text object.
    22. Virtual joystick: Simulate curosr keys according touch events.
    23. Webfont-loader: Load web font by google webfont loader in preload stage.
    24. XOR: Encrypt or decrypt string by XOR algorithm.

    Download them in a signle minify file.
